summary: Murder and trouble hits Veum when he meets up with classmates in the rock-band Camp, when he resumes contact with a former flame Rebecca, now wife of his buddy. A Varg Veum mystery by best-selling crime novel by Gunnar Staalesen. Staalesen.
cast: Trond Espen Seim|Per Kjerstad|Bjørn Floberg|Pia Tjelta|Fridtjov Såheim|Ragnhild Alvær|Linn Andersen|Anna Bache-Wiig|Henriette Ertsås|Kjersti Fjeldstad|Ragnhild Gudbrandsen|Kristin Gundersen|Iram Haq|Endre Hellestveit|Andreas Holt|Alette Hordnes Hoff|Malene Hordnes Hoff|Nils Jørgen Kaalstad|Gard Knudstad|Rikke Larssen|Ingvild Lien|Jesper Malm|Marianne Nødtved Nilsen|Karianne Nordstrøm|Thomas Numme|Joachim Rafaelsen|Harald J. Rønneberg|Steinar Taarn Sande|Tore Chr. Sævold|Linn Taule|Markus Tønseth|Ewoud Van Veen|Kevin Andreas Smilden
title: Varg Veum - Ángeles caídos
